",["$r","details",null,{"children":[["$r","summary",null,{"children":["我无法访问 ",["$r","tt",null,{"children":"f-droid.org"}]]}],["$r","p",null,{"children":["对于首次安装的用户，",["$r","tt",null,{"children":"f-droid.org"}]," 是官方下载地址，也应当始终是你的首选。如果你无法访问此网站，那么下方有其他选项。你将需要格外谨慎，确保使用你信任的来源。恶意行为者可能会将你带到有伪造及潜在恶意的 F-Droid 客户端。"]}],["$r","h3",null,{"children":"从其他来源下载"}],["$r","p",null,{"children":"这些替代来源由 F-Droid 团队提供，请验证它们正确："}],["$r","ul",null,{"children":[["$r","li",null,{"children":["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://gitlab.com/fdroid/fdroidclient/-/releases/","children":["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://gitlab.com/fdroid/fdroidclient/-/releases/","rel":"nofollow","children":"https://gitlab.com/fdroid/fdroidclient/-/releases/"}]}]}],["$r","li",null,{"children":["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://github.com/f-droid/fdroidclient/releases/","children":["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://github.com/f-droid/fdroidclient/releases/","rel":"nofollow","children":"https://github.com/f-droid/fdroidclient/releases/"}]}]}],["$r","li",null,{"children":["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://cloudflare.f-droid.org/","children":["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://cloudflare.f-droid.org/","rel":"nofollow","children":"https://cloudflare.f-droid.org/"}]}]}]]}],["$r","p",null,{"children":"还是不走运？你可以直接从此镜像下载最新版本："}],["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"{{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/archive/org.fdroid.fdroid_1019052.apk"}],["$r","p",null,{"children":"如果你知道怎样验证 PGP 签名，你可以从这里下载它："}],["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"{{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/archive/org.fdroid.fdroid_1019052.apk.asc"}]]}]]}]
